content: this is a summary of a legal case in the klaipeda district court the case involved two parties referred to as applicant a and applicant k and the defendant referred to as nk the case was about the division of matrimonial property the movable property a ford mondeo car was divided with each party receiving 316 shares the immovable property a flat was divided with each party receiving 38 shares the defendant was ordered to pay compensation to applicant k the court rejected the defendants counterclaim but ordered the applicants to pay a portion of the funeral expenses the court determined the amount of compensation based on the market value of the property and the shares owned by each party the court also considered the financial situation of the parties in determining the payment terms the court upheld the applicants claims and partially upheld the defendants counterclaim the court ordered the party who won the judgment to pay the costs incurred by the other party the plaintiff ak has paid a stamp duty and legal aid costs the defendant has also paid a stamp duty and submitted evidence of costs incurred the court has made decisions regarding the division of community property and ordered the defendant to acquire certain parts of the property additionally the defendant has been ordered to pay compensation and costs to ak and ak has been ordered to pay certain costs to the defendant
